overview: Fischli dissects the ideals that fuel artistic ambitions and irreverently alludes to their contradictions.  Content becomes a moving target, and the main event of the production remains unclear.  "Welcome back," says the protagonist repeatedly, or "Hey guys!" salutations reminiscent of a creator from TikTok or YouTube greeting their subscribers with a new post.  In this unstable rhythm of darkness and light, silence and sound, engagement and reflection, these declarations come into view as disruptive flashbacks.  [Overview Courtesy of Swiss Institute]
title: I love being creative
